br.com.concepting.framework.network.mail.resource

Class MailResource

  • java.lang.Object
    • br.com.concepting.framework.caching.CachedObject
      • br.com.concepting.framework.resource.BaseResource
        • br.com.concepting.framework.network.mail.resource.MailResource
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class MailResource
extends BaseResource
    Classe responsável pelo armazenamento das configurações dos protocolos de envio e recebimento de e-Mail.
    Since:
    1.0
    Author:
    fvilarinho
    See Also:
